block.p: Elizabeth Palmer Martin, the daughter of Ina Martin Rexford of Dexter, Mich., and Allen Martin of Burlington, Vt., was married yesterday to Michael Joseph Bowe, the son of Mary and James Bowe of Pearl River, N.Y. John Kelleher, a Roman Catholic deacon and an uncle of the bridegroom, performed the ceremony at St. Denis Church in Hanover, N.H.
The couple are associates at New York law firms, the bride at Sullivan & Cromwell and the bridegroom at Kasowitz, Benson, Torres & Friedman.

Elizabeth Palmer Martin, the daughter of Ina Martin Rexford of Dexter, Mich., and Allen Martin of Burlington, Vt., was married yesterday to Michael Joseph Bowe, the son of Mary and James Bowe of Pearl River, N.Y. John Kelleher, a Roman Catholic deacon and an uncle of the bridegroom, performed the ceremony at St. Denis Church in Hanover, N.H.
The couple are associates at New York law firms, the bride at Sullivan & Cromwell and the bridegroom at Kasowitz, Benson, Torres & Friedman.

Mrs. Bowe, 31, graduated from Williams College and received a law degree from Duke University. Her father is a partner in Downs, Rachlin & Martin, a law firm in Burlington. She is the stepdaughter of Bonnie Reid Martin.
Mr. Bowe, 33, graduated from Fordham University and New York Law School. His father retired as a lieutenant in the New York City Fire Department.
